summary: This is an internal FBI email requesting assistance for Squad C-20 (VCAC/HT) on the ongoing Epstein/Maxwell investigation. It describes the case as a high-profile opportunity and asks available agents to contact a Special Agent and copy their respective Supervisory Special Agent.

persons.name: SSA
persons.context: The Supervisory Special Agent to be copied when agents respond to the request for assistance on the Epstein/Maxwell investigation.

events.title: Request for FBI Assistance on Epstein/Maxwell Investigation
events.description: Squad C-20 (VCAC/HT) is seeking assistance from available agents for the ongoing Epstein/Maxwell investigation, described as a high-profile case.

keyFacts: The FBI's Squad C-20 (VCAC/HT) is actively investigating the Epstein/Maxwell case.
The investigation is described as a 'high profile case' and a 'unique opportunity' for agents.
The email is an internal request for additional FBI agent assistance on the investigation.
Agents are instructed to contact a Special Agent (SA) and copy their Supervisory Special Agent (SSA) if available.
